meanings.definition: A transparent tank or bowl in which fish and other water creatures are kept.
meanings.sent1: My brother has a small aquariums in his room with colorful fish.
meanings.sent2: The aquariums at the zoo had a variety of fish and sea creatures.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally dropped my phone in the aquariums while trying to take a picture of the fish.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like aquariums, reflecting the beauty of the underwater world.
meanings.sent5: The aquariums shimmered in the sunlight, showcasing the vibrant marine life within.

meanings.definition: A building containing aquariums for public viewing of aquatic life.
meanings.sent1: We visited the aquariums downtown to see the sharks and dolphins.
meanings.sent2: The new aquariums in town has a special exhibit on coral reefs.
meanings.sent3: The aquariums were so crowded with people that it felt like a fish market.
meanings.sent4: His mind was an aquariums of knowledge, filled with facts about marine biology.
meanings.sent5: The aquariums were a mesmerizing display of underwater wonders, captivating visitors of all ages.
